data.name: label2.Text
data.value: At the beginning of the game, the number 324 is given and both players have a common number of points, which is equal to 0 at the beginning. The players take turns, dividing the current number (324) by 2 or 3 in each turn. The number is allowed to be divided only if results in an integer. If the number obtained after division is an even number, then 1 point is added to the total number of points. However, if the number obtained in the division is an odd number, then 1 point is deducted from the total number of points. The game ends when the number is 2 or 3. If the total number of points at the end of the game is less than or equal to 0, then the player who started the game wins. Otherwise, the other player wins.

data.name: label4.Text
data.value: Before you start the game, you should choose who will make the first move: you or the AI. Moves are made by pressing the buttons "/2" and "/3", under these buttons the result is displayed, which can be obtained by pressing a certain button. You can choose to generate a random starting number, however, this is an experimental feature that does not always lead to a fair game ending (for example, the number will initially not be divisible by more than 2 times). If suddenly you finished the game or want to start again - you can start the "reset" button.
